Class World

java.lang.Object

public class World
extends java.lang.Object

The Class World contains all the world objects.

Jérôme Dalbert

getFirstNearServiceAndProvider

public Couple<Service,WorldObject> getFirstNearServiceAndProvider(java.lang.String serviceName,
                                                                  WorldObject worldObject,
                                                                  int range)
Gets the nearest service and its provider. The service must have the "serviceName" name and the search is performed around "givenWorldObject"

Parameters:
serviceName - the service name
worldObject - the world object around which we find the nearest service
range - the range
Returns:
the nearest service and its provider
